lender.occupational_info: Solve Media was founded by veteran entrepreneurs and technologists focused on innovative internet advertising solutions. The Company’s proprietary online advertising system the TYPE-IN™ was designed to create new and highly-effective opportunities for brands to advertise online. The system leverages CAPTCHA authentication for brand messaging to bring unprecedented consumer engagement. With the solution, Solve Media guarantees brand message delivery and increases recall rates and return on investment for advertisers, creates new revenue opportunities for publishers, and simplifies the authentication process for consumers

lender.name: Dennis

I found it so satisfying that i not only invested the money from the certificate, I now make a monthly loan from my own funds as well.

lender.name: Gabriele
lender.occupational_info:
I am a photographer with thousands of pictures organizing my photos in databases to keep consistency.
Most of the time, I want to keep my image as natural as possible. My goal is to clean up dust specks and scratches from digital photos or to enhance color and contrast without overdoing it - that is, without producing annoying noise, those specs of color that make my images look unnatural. A little tweaking can go a long way. My tries result in a large amount of copies, hence the need for heavy duty databases.
Long discussions have ensued among many photographers, amateur and professional alike, as to what format is better: digital or film. There’s really no answer, but some people are adamant about one or the other. Whatever the case and whatever medium you use, I'm not shy about trying out both from time to time. Each has its advantages, and it’s a fun ride to see what I get when the light shines on my film or on my CMOS digital sensor.

lender.name: Mark
lender.whereabouts: The High Country, Southern Tablelands New South Wales
lender.loan_because:
Making capital available makes the world a better place. I have had access to capital, and it has made my life better, and making capital available to others lets all markets improve. In the end, we all trade together, everyone, everywhere. The world is a giant network of trade.
It's important to invest in small businesses, so that people can improve their situation and have self-reliance, regardless of which country they are in, or how much money they have to start with. That's true for me, just as it's true for anyone else on Kiva, whether a lender or a borrower.
Capitalism = liberty. Liberty = dignity.
lender.occupational_info: Entrepreneur. Maker of software. Security and financial systems.
